name: Unholy Rupture
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You trigger a blast of unholy magic at target point you can see within range. All creatures within 15 feet of the point must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 5d10 unholy damage, halved on a success.

You can target a creature you have reanimated instead of a point. If you do, the creature is utterly destroyed, and you regain half the MP spent on this spell.
empower: Can target any reanimated creature you control, even if they are out of range or sight.
